discourse_list.title: Create NFT for the MKR community

content.content: Hello, As you know, we are in a moment of exploration of the NFT market. Since MKR is one of the reference DAOs I think we should address the possibility of creating a collection of NFTs for the community. Some members of the community continue to ask about such profit sharing, etc. For all the above and as a very important DAO, I think it is a market that we could address. a greeting
content.GPT-summary: The author is proposing the creation of a collection of NFTs for the MKR community, as they believe it is a market that the community could address. They mention that some members of the community have been asking about profit sharing. The post does not receive any feedback, but the author is open to constructive criticism.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: pcav6:  nt DAO, I think it is a market that we could address. a greeting   Yeah I like the idea too. We have thought also rewarding voters / delegates with some cool NFT drops. (Alpha Information)
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving entirely positive feedback on proposal

content.content: NFTs are fundamentally terrible cryptocurrencies. Why not revisit the premise of adding NFTs in a year or two once they’ve all collapsed in price and lost all liquidity? If it was ever a good idea outside of just getting bubble returns, then it will still be a good idea in a year or two.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: Hi @pcav6 , Check out this post on forum badges, which are issued as non-transferrable NFT’s.     Badges Are Live In The Maker Forum! Community Development       The Maker community is extremely excited to announce the arrival of our new Badges!  Created by members of the Community Development team to help personalize interactions between community members in the Maker Forum, the first release includes 33 badges that can be earned for taking actions relating to Dai and Governance. IF there are badges you know should be released that you are not receiving, please post about it in our Github, here.  Badges in Discourse, the software used to power the Maker…
GPT-discussion-categories: None of the topics listed match.

content.content: In fact, it is a very popular idea to reward users with NFTs for accomplishing specific tasks. The poap is proof of that, but we are MakerDAO and we can do better.    dappback.com   DappBack Earn crypto rewards for your web3 contributions!      as an example that one there is very cool.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving positive feedback on proposal

content.content: If Poaps in the Latin communities are very popular, especially for online events, it would be good to use them. I think the costs involved in creating something like this is not so cost effective. Using the infrastructure of the Poaps would be the most useful.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: Where can I see what badges there are an how to get them?
I think it’s just a proposal?

If you talk about badges like this one and the ones you have on the forum, you can get them through your dedication to the forum, even if they have no more than an aesthetic case, they can help you to position yourself better in the community. Go to your profile, connect your Metamask wallet and you’re done. you’ll get some if you reach the milestones. You can see the ones I got there: and see how to get them.
